video.title: Food Network Star
video.synopsis: Hopefuls compete in culinary challenges to determine one winner, who will receive a contract with Food Network and become the next Food Network Star.

episodes.synopsis: Hopefuls vie for their own Food Network show. Celebrity mentors help them prepare to audition, and each finalist makes a tape and a dish to present.
episodes.title: Are You Ready for Prime Time?

episodes.synopsis: Finalists must create their best burger and present it to 100 fans, who will decide which one looks the most appetizing.
episodes.title: Burger Bash

episodes.synopsis: Finalists show off their chops -- literally -- proving they can take any combination of ingredients to new heights as they battle in the kitchen.
episodes.title: A Star Is Chopped

episodes.synopsis: With luxury cinemas that enhance the movie-going experience trending, teams of three finalists must create menus and movie trailers for film buffs.
episodes.title: Big-Screen Bites Challenge

episodes.synopsis: The finalists handle some unexpected challenges during live cooking demos and then participate in Fourth of July Live, a one-take interactive show.
episodes.title: 4th of July Live Challenge

episodes.synopsis: Finalists come up with products representing their unique brands and styles, then create, package and pitch them to a panel of top food executives.
episodes.title: Product Pitch Challenge

episodes.synopsis: The chefs must prove they're adventurous by using unusual ingredients in dishes they'll auction off, hoping their plates will fetch top dollar.
episodes.title: Star Charity Auction

episodes.synopsis: The finalists film three-minute "food story shows" about a pizza joint and a doughnut shop, then guest judges screen and critique their efforts.
episodes.title: Food Stories from the Road

episodes.synopsis: Contestants try to show they can solve any culinary problem as they take on a challenge to rehabilitate a restaurant's failing and outdated dishes.
episodes.title: Menu: Impossible

episodes.synopsis: The final four get to pitch their shows to Food Network. Based on their presentations, three will be chosen, and their shows will be made into pilots.
episodes.title: Network Pitch Challenge

episodes.synopsis: Knowing the votes are in, the finalists return to the studio, where the judges share favorite memories before revealing the new Food Network Star.
episodes.title: America Picks a Star

episodes.synopsis: Hopefuls compete for the ultimate prize: their own show on Food Network. Mentors Alton Brown, Giada De Laurentiis and Bobby Flay help them prepare.
episodes.title: Hollywood Calling

episodes.synopsis: Since a Food Network star must be able to teach home viewers, mentor Alton Brown challenges finalists to teach him how to make one of his own recipes.
episodes.title: Please Try This at Home

episodes.synopsis: In tests of knowledge and adaptability, five finalists bid on sabotages to saddle their competitors with, then battle it out in the kitchen.
episodes.title: Cutthroat Food Star

episodes.synopsis: Since a Food Network star needs a multiplatform presence, Bobby Flay tests the finalists' social media acumen as they craft behind-the-scenes videos.
episodes.title: Internet Marketing Video

episodes.synopsis: Finalists take the stage at Knott's Berry Farm, an amusement park built on culinary tradition, to perform a food demo for the park visitors.
episodes.title: Live Demo at Knott's Berry Farm

episodes.synopsis: After devising products that represent their personal gastronomic styles, finalists make commercials for their creations.
episodes.title: Product Commercial

episodes.synopsis: Each finalist is challenged to create a dish which represents them and then describe it to guests at a pool party held at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas.
episodes.title: Vegas Pool Party

episodes.synopsis: In Las Vegas, finalists are split into two teams that must each create a memorable dining experience for the selection committee and a special guest.
episodes.title: One-of-a-Kind Experience

episodes.synopsis: To show their ability to think on their feet, finalists must solve a kitchen problem for a Rachael Ray viewer, then demo their dish on Rachael's show.
episodes.title: Rachael Ray Show

episodes.synopsis: Four finalists shoot promos for the shows they hope to host on the Food Network -- but only three will be chosen to make the pilots for their shows.
episodes.title: Promos and Pilots

episodes.synopsis: Never-before-seen footage tells of the season that culminates now that viewers have voted for the next Food Network Star.
episodes.title: A Food Star is Born
